co.lqnt.lockbox.key

Class PrivateKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.lqnt.lockbox.key.PrivateKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyInterface, PrivateKeyInterface

    public class PrivateKey
extends Object
implements PrivateKeyInterface
    Represents a Lockbox private key.

          BigInteger primeExponent2,
          BigInteger coefficient)
        Construct a new Lockbox private key.
        Parameters:
        modulus - The modulus.
        publicExponent - The public exponent.
        privateExponent - The private exponent.
        prime1 - The first prime, or 'P'.
        prime2 - The second prime, or 'Q'.
        primeExponent1 - The first prime exponent, or 'DP'.
        primeExponent2 - The first prime exponent, or 'DQ'.
        coefficient - The coefficient, or 'QInv'.
